Martin Trapp

in between worlds

I'm a researcher in machine learning, applied cognitive science, natural language processing and computer vision at the Austrian Research Institute for Artificial Intelligence in Vienna. Previously, I have been working as a researcher in medical and biological image processing at the VRVis Research Center for Virtual Reality and Visualisation. My current focus lies on Bayesian nonparametrics, traceable Bayesian networks, clustering, concept learning, dynamic clustering and applications in computer vision and natural language processing.
